label: listening
description: Listening to instructor/taking notes, etc.

label: individual_thinking
description: Individual thinking/problem solving. Only mark when an instructor explicitly asks students to think about a clicker question or another question/problem on their own.

label: clicker_question_in_group
description: Discuss clicker question in groups of 2 or more students

label: worksheet_activity_in_group
description: Working in groups on worksheet activity

label: other_group_activity
description: Other assigned group activity, such as responding to instructor question

label: answering_question
description: Student answering a question posed by the instructor with rest of class listening

label: asking_question
description: Student asks question

label: whole_class_discussion
description: Engaged in whole class discussion by offering explanations, opinion, judgment, etc. to whole class, often facilitated by instructor

label: making_prediction
description: Making a prediction about the outcome of demo or experiment

label: presentation
description: Presentation by student(s)

label: test
description: Test or quiz

label: waiting
description: Waiting (instructor late, working on fixing AV problems, instructor otherwise occupied, etc.)

label: other
description: Other – explain in comments

label: lecturing
description: Lecturing (presenting content, deriving mathematical results, presenting a problem solution, etc.)

label: real_time_writing
description: Real-time writing on board, doc. projector, etc. (often checked off along with Lec)

label: follow_up
description: Follow-up/feedback on clicker question or activity to entire class

label: posing_question
description: Posing non-clicker question to students (non-rhetorical)

label: asking_clicker_question
description: Asking a clicker question (mark the entire time the instructor is using a clicker question, not just when first asked)

label: answering_question
description: Listening to and answering student questions with entire class listening

label: moving_and_guiding
description: Moving through class guiding ongoing student work during active learning task

label: one_on_one
description: One-on-one extended discussion with one or a few individuals, not paying attention to the rest of the class (can be along with MG or AnQ)

label: demo
description: Showing or conducting a demo, experiment, simulation, video, or animation

label: admin
description: Administration (assign homework, return tests, etc.)

label: waiting
description: Waiting when there is an opportunity for an instructor to be interacting with or observing/listening to student or group activities and the instructor is not doing so

label: other
description: Other – explain in comments
